sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update portfolio plan configurations with rank configuration</description>
        <name>Update rank config for PPConfigs</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info("app-alignment-workspace: Start to update portfolio plan configurations with rank configuration");
var portfolioPlanConfigGr = new GlideRecord('sn_align_ws_roadmap_configuration');
portfolioPlanConfigGr.addNullQuery('rank_configuration');
portfolioPlanConfigGr.query();

while (portfolioPlanConfigGr.next()) {
    var ppConfig = new PortfolioPlanConfiguration(portfolioPlanConfigGr);
    if (ppConfig.updateRankConfiguration()) {
        gs.info('app-alignment-workspace: Updated rank configuration succeed for portfolio plan configuration: ' + portfolioPlanConfigGr.getValue('source_table'));
    } else {
        gs.warn('app-alignment-workspace: Fail to update rank configuration for portfolio plan configuration: ' + portfolioPlanConfigGr.getValue('source_table'));
    }
}

gs.info("app-alignment-workspace: End of update portfolio plan configurations with rank configuration");]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-03-21 20:20:17</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>74fcfe9877352110cfbdaba9cf5a9940</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Update rank config for PPConfigs</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">9aa0eddcc70c2010d302670f6ec260c4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">9aa0eddcc70c2010d302670f6ec260c4</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_74fcfe9877352110cfbdaba9cf5a9940</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-03-23 23:26:49</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
